titleStmt.title: The several speeches of Duke Hamilton Earl of Cambridg, Henry Earl of Holland, and Arthur Lord Capel, upon the scaffold immediately before their execution, on Friday the 9. of March. Also the several exhortations, and conferences with them, upon the scaffold, by Dr Sibbald, Mr Bolton, & Mr Hodges. Published by special authority.
titleStmt.author: Hamilton, James Hamilton, Duke of, 1606-1649.

titleStmt.title: The several speeches of Duke Hamilton Earl of Cambridg, Henry Earl of Holland, and Arthur Lord Capel, upon the scaffold immediately before their execution, on Friday the 9. of March. Also the several exhortations, and conferences with them, upon the scaffold, by Dr Sibbald, Mr Bolton, & Mr Hodges. Published by special authority.
titleStmt.author: Hamilton, James Hamilton, Duke of, 1606-1649.
Holland, Henry Rich, Earl of, 1590-1649.
Capel of Hadham, Arthur Capel, Baron, 1610?-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Peter Cole, Francis Tyton, and John Playford,

notesStmt.note: D1v has catchword "righte-" and lacks side-note. Variant: quire D in a different setting, with side-note on D1v and catchword "Hodges".
Annotation on Thomason copy: "march 9. 1648"; the '9' in the imprint has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
